title: EAC counselling query
content: So it's been a while since I received the seat allotment mail, what's bugging me is that they wrote a clause that "partial allotment of seats" has been done, does this mean that my seat ain't confirmed even after making the payment or does it mean that only a few of seats available have been allotted to EAC candidates?

comments.body: Your seat is confirmed as long as you score 60% in PCM subjects in your board exams. "Partial allotment" quite literally means all the seats have not been allotted only some percentage of seats have been. It has nothing to do with the seats being provisional.
